attributes.action: 16 and 17 year olds should be given the right to vote in all future elections and referendums
attributes.additional_details: All 16 and 17 year olds to be given the right to vote in all future elections and referendums

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Lower the UK franchise to 16 year's of age

Created by: Rudi Affolter

Closing: 30/03/2015
